Contributing

Development of irg welcomes contribution of feature requests, bug reports and suggested improvements through the issue board.

Prefer to Email?

Email Alec Robitaille (see DESCRIPTION).

Though note that private discussions over email don’t help others - of course email is totally warranted if it’s a sensitive problem of any kind.

Code of Conduct

Please note that the irg package is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this package you agree to abide by its terms.

Thanks for contributing!

This contributing guide is adapted from the tidyverse contributing guide available at https://raw.githubusercontent.com/r-lib/usethis/master/inst/templates/tidy-contributing.md
